<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A pseudo probe verifier that can be run after each IR passes to detect the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// violation of updating probe factors. In principle, the sum of distribution</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// factor for a probe should be identical before and after a pass. For a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function pass, the factor sum for a probe would be typically 100%.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprofileprobepass"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprofileprobepass/#a525c05be6b1a63057c532b8b39415879">SampleProfileProbePass</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;SampleProfileProbePass&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses">PreservedAnalyses</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprofileprobepass/#a8c1accd469872b7673c9c8a033e30a0c">run</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af9c9208365fd9ce11392b4d79485e259">ModuleAnalysisManager</a> &amp;AM);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pseudo probe distribution factor updater.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sample profile annotation can happen in both LTO prelink and postlink. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// postlink-time re-annotation can degrade profile quality because of prelink</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code duplication transformation, such as loop unrolling, jump threading,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// indirect call promotion etc. As such, samples corresponding to a source</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// location may be aggregated multiple times in postlink. With a concept of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// distribution factor for pseudo probes, samples can be distributed among</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// duplicated probes reasonable based on the assumption that optimizations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// duplicating code well-maintain the branch frequency information (BFI). This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pass updates distribution factors for each pseudo probe at the end of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prelink pipeline, to reflect an estimated portion of the real execution</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pseudoprobeupdatepass"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pseudoprobeupdatepass/#a74f7c90ce16b5d0f31936ee5a677ae45">PseudoProbeUpdatePass</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;PseudoProbeUpdatePass&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> runOnFunction(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adce09a5a0de0e3177eb00e932734af2f">FunctionAnalysisManager</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#a83c7e5ca51099e4efa895791a02fb0ed">FAM</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM&#95;TRANSFORMS&#95;IPO&#95;SAMPLEPROFILEPROBE&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
